messages: content='create and run a python file to display a small loading animation from 1 to 100' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={}

content='The Python file loading_animation.py was created and executed. It displays a loading animation from 1% to 100% in the terminal, updating in place, and finishes with "Done!".\n\nIf you want to modify the animation style or speed, let me know!' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={}
content='modify the loading animation to be progress bar animation, you can use any library you want, ensure to install it before you run.' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={}

content='The loading animation has been updated to use a progress bar with the tqdm library. The script now displays a smooth progress bar from 1% to 100% in the terminal and finishes with "Done!".\n\nIf you want to further customize the progress bar (style, speed, colors, etc.), just let me know!' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={}

content='The updated loading_animation.py script with the tqdm progress bar ran successfully and displayed the progress bar animation, finishing with "Done!".\n\nIf you want to see the code or make further adjustments to the animation, let me know!' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={}
